attributes.title: Meditation Technique to Unclutch® from Your Mind
attributes.description:
http://innerawakening.org/
Ultimate Meditation retreat for a Conscious Breakthrough - Inner Awakening

From the works of Living Enlightened Master Paramahamsa Nithyananda.  In this clip taken from the Shiva Sutras discourse titled, Transcend Your Desires, Swamiji describes the meditation technique fro the true seeker who is serious about enlightenment.  It is for those coyurageous ones who are ready to keep enlightenment at the forefront and leave everything else aside.  When you suddenly unclutch® from the mind when thoughts arise, and not let mind take over, a quantum jump in the inner space happens.  He then takes us through a guided meditation to experience this state.  The complete discourse may be ordered online at www.lifeblissgalleria.com.
